text: Arau tomara purbe'o bahuto raachulara oparata mithyaraopa karaa haichila, kintu te'omlokaka mithyaraopa karaa arau kasta diyara pichato te'omloke dhairya dharana karaichila, arasesata te'omlokara ocarata amara sahaya ahiche. Arau allahara banisamuhara kono paraibartanakarai na'i. Niscaya raachulasakalara kichu sambada tomara ocaralaike'o ahiche
